module.additional_description: Бесплатная и быстрая настройкаДоступ к кредитным картам и более 100 локальных платежных решений с 1 простой интеграциейСвязаться с 50+ миллионами владельцев SkrillВысочайшие стандарты безопасности и технологии борьбы с мошенничествомБеспроблемная оплата с мобильного, планшета и компьютера

module.name: paypal
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.displayName: Boxtal Connect - 1st shipping solution in Europe
module.description: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Coli
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, Delivengo,UPS, DHL, etc.
module.additional_description: 1. Multiply your conversion rate by 2 and boost your net salesWith our negotiated rates for the best carriers, with no contract and no minimum volume requirement, you offer the best delivery rates to your customers.Maximize your chances to convert by offering the 3 types of shipping expected by your customers: the economic collection point (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis ...), home delivery in 48H (Colissimo) or the express for the most hurried ones (Chronopost, UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL ...).The Boxtal Connect plugin can display the pick-up location map for carriers of your choice.And it's as simple as a checkbox in your backoffice! 2.  Save 1 hour each day in the management of your shippingsOur free Boxtal Connect plugin allows you to import your orders on boxtal.com in 1 click and manage your shipments in record time. No need to re-enter information, your customer’s choice of delivery is retrieved and the corresponding offers are listed. All you have to do is print all your transport labels and prepare your parcels.Boxtal helps you in the customs formalities for your international shipments: when filling an order, we display the right form and the necessary documents are generated at the same time as the labels. 3. Improve your customers' experience to build loyaltyWith Boxtal's efficient parcel tracking, you know where your parcels are located and you are informed of delays or delivery incidents! Your customers can view tracking statuses and receive shipping notifications if you turn on this option.Finally, you can generate return labels in just a few clicks in case your customers want to do so. 4. Security and reliability for you and your customersThe privacy and security of your data are important to you ? No worries: all the exchanges between your WooCommerce shop and Boxtal are encrypted! Nobody will be able to intercept your information or those of your customers.Ensuring the availability of our solution 24 hours a day is our priority: we constantly monitor our technical infrastructure to ensure that your business will not be disrupted.

module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial

module.name: cronjobs

module.author: PrestaShop

module.additional_description: Назначение модуля:Экономия времени: если встроить простейшие задачи в автоматизированные процедуры, вам не придется постоянно помнить о них.Планирование: необходимые текущие задачи будут выполняться сами собой, по установленному графику.Упрощение административной работы: вы сразу видите полный список задач и можете добавлять в него новые пункты по мере необходимости.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.
module.additional_description: Specialized in the multichannel collection (online/offline) of customer reviews, Verified Reviews measures, and analyses your customer's satisfaction so you can improve and drive your business decisions. We offer you a multi-tools platform for the management, follow-up, and an optimal diffusion of all contents collected and enable you to increase your reputation, visibility, and search engine ranking on the internet. Why should you choose Verified Reviews?1 - Fast and simpleLearn how to use the solution very quickly and start now collecting reviews from your clients. We can survey people up to 1 year after their orders. Our pre-built Verified Reviews integration with Oracle Commerce Cloud gets your site up and running with ratings and reviews and customer feedback very quickly, saving development time.2 - Website, product & offline reviewsWe collect 3 different types of reviews via one post-transaction email: website reviews where customers can evaluate your online shop; product reviews which mark specifically the purchases, and offline reviews if you want to show a grade for your offline shops. Everything in our solution can be tailored for your needs from emails, forms, campaign deadlines, and widget displays.3 - A global partnership with GoogleWant some stars in your SEM? Use our solution and display stars in your AdWords campaigns and PLA. Customers reviews will also allow optimization of your SEO as they produce active content on your product page.4 - A trusted certificateYour reviews are hosted in a Verified Reviews certificate with your name and logo on it. It gives more credit to them.

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: paypalmx
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

badge.label: Save time: Partner of the year

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.
module.additional_description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions. What this module does for you-      Easy set-up, plug & play-      Responsive design-      All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home (national & international)@pickup point (national & international)@Parcels locker International-      Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module-      Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation)-      Print directly from the backend-      Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Chronopost supports more than 5800 e-merchants in the development of their business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Chronopost supports more than 5800 e-merchants in the development of their business. Access the most innovative transport solutions on the market and offer the best express delivery experience to your customers, in France or around the world.
module.additional_description: Thanks to the Chronopost extension, offer your customers the most innovative delivery methods on the market and develop your business in France and abroad easily! No additional development is required, all Chronopost's Express delivery offers and services are included in this module.You will be able to easily present to your customers the different contractualized services.The simple and quick installation and configuration of the module will allow you to start your business quickly.Technical support by Chronopost is available if necessary.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom.
module.additional_description: Klarna will improve your checkout experience by providing ways by direct by banking, by invoice or financing. We call these magical payment methods Pay now, Pay later and Slice it. Simple, safe, and oh so smoooth. No matter what Klarna option your customer chooses to pay, you get paid when the goods ship. Klarna deliversOne-click repeat purchases.Global support, local optimization.Klarna absorbs all credit and fraud risk.It’s easy to get started with Klarna. Your benefitYou will see an increase in conversions and order value.You will reach a new audience.You will always get paid.Less operations more selling. Klarna maximizes conversion rates by letting consumers pay in a simple way when and how they prefer to. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchase. To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Checkout, sign up here: https://eu.portal.klarna.com/signup/?products=kco&platform=prestashop

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.additional_description: Direct connection to the consumer’s and the merchant’s bank account brings a structural cost advantage to processing payments that Satispay leverages to sign up merchants with a cost-effective, convenient and easy-to-use solution. Thanks to the efficiency of our independent network, Satispay can offer the service to merchants with a pricing model that is both cheap and easy to understand. There are no sign-up costs or monthly fees, the sole charge for merchants is 0.5% on payments less than or equal to 10€ and 0.5% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€. Satispay contributes to management costs reduction by improving users’ conversion rate also thanks to the new QR code payments experience.

With Direct Transfer the customer instantly transfers the purchase amount to your account. Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months. Direct Transfer allows customers to pay the purchase amount via bank transfer without leaving the shop check-out.

module.additional_description: More time to run your businessThe Adyen PrestaShop plugin is built in-house and works seamlessly out of the box. This will greatly reduce training and implementation time. We’ll look after your payments so you can spend more time running your business.  Grow globallyLet customers pay the way they want, anywhere in the world, and add new payment methods to your checkout with the flip of a switch. Adyen supports all popular payment methods: Cartes Bancaires, iDEAL, Multibanco, Apple Pay, Google Pay ™, and everything in between.  Keep your customers coming back Give your customers an effortless checkout experience with no redirects for cards, native two-factor authentication (3DS2), and one-click payments. Utilize the newest technology to optimize your webshop and capture additional revenue. The increase in authorized payments and reduction in chargebacks will keep your customers coming back.  Robust platform Adyen’s systems have been designed for maximum uptime, so you can rely on a stable platform. And with our industry-leading risk management tools you can minimize fraud and maximize conversions. You’ll also be able to offer more secure ways of processing card data, and reduce the scope of your PCI assessments, by using secured fields at your checkout.

module.description_full: With this plugin you will be able to accept card payments on an eCommerce website easily and securely. Charge your customers in up to 14 currencies without worrying about pricy exchanges and get access to your funds quickly with next day settlement.
module.additional_description: We know that time and money matter to our merchants. That’s why we’re committed to costing them less and freeing up more of their time to grow their business.   Great pricingImprove your margins with our low rates: 1.3% (for all consumer cards from UK and EEA) & 2.8% (for all corporate cards and for consumer cards outside of the EEA)No additional fixed fees per transactionProcess up to £/€ 100,000 per month for free (depending on the plan you select and the cards your customers pay with)  FXCharge and settle in up to 14 currenciesExchange money at the Interbank Rate and avoid unnecessary costs SettlementAccess your funds 24h after your customer pays One place to manage all your business needsBest in class UX with a single interface for both your merchant and business accountsStart for free or get more from your money with our paid plans Take a look at our website to see why accepting payments through Revolut is the right decision for your business.
